title: Looking for casual/competitive team or individual players
body:
- I play casually - but competitively
- Wanting to experience this game where a rough/flexible plan has been thought out, engagement specifics have been discussed, priorities have been made, etc
- I can play from 4.30pm or 5.30pm AEST til probably midnight-ish
- Within my elo: I can play jg and mid well, I can play top and adc ok, I'm not great at sup, but willing to play any role
- I used to be Master League in starcraft II, so most mechanics and learning/practice come naturally - it's more the situational stuff I need to learn. I'm roughly silver/gold league in LoL as far as I can tell.

replies.body: I play every now and then and I really enjoy playing for objectives instead of just running around getting kills. Feel free to add me :)
